description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/uvm47 (compensated affiliate link) - The Hagibis external solid state enclosure snaps securely to the back of an iPhone (or Android phone with adapter) for recording video onto an external drive. See more production : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvvVOzAg3BFV34vVmIhs8OJ and subscribe ! https://lon.tv/s

title: A Magsafe External NVME SSD Enclosure for External Video Recording! Hagibis Review
